data.name: Tactical AR
data.detailed_description:
Gun Controller Support

Playstation Sharpshooter, Tactical AR FCG, Hyperblaster, 3d printed vive stocks, Cabela's Top Shot Elite (PS3 and XBOX version's)


About the Game

Tactical AR was created with one purpose, to build real firearms skills and habits in virtual reality. Unique Features: We currently support 3 external firearms controllers, with more on the way. We support a unique movement approach called VRMove Me which uses 2 vive trackers to allow users to run in place Our Movement system fully supports Track Straps, by Rebuff Reality Our philosophy is that the best training is fun, and that muscle memory developed in virtual reality effectively translates in to real weapon muscle memory. Current Course Support 5 unique run and gun courses currently available, with more on the way CQB popup course 150 yard popup rifle range Current controller support for PISTOL (Glock style grip angle and sight picture): Vive Controller Sony Sharpshooter Cabela's Top Shot Elite (PS3) Current Controller support for AR-15: Vive Controller (3d printed stock strongly suggested) Sony Sharpshooter Cabela's Top Shot Elite (PS3) Tactical AR AR-15 fire control group (patent pending) Current Movement Support: Controller based directional movement (Menu button, and direction controller is facing, when at a low ready, and pointing your muzzle at the ground) VRMove ME for all controllers for realistic physical movement based motion !!! Live in the Beta release !!! VR Course builder, almost 20 courses included, plus course builder support to add your own. Bind a controller to VRBuilder role, and follow the on screen instructions to start making your own. A future release will include built in course sharing features.
data.about_the_game:
Tactical AR was created with one purpose, to build real firearms skills and habits in virtual reality.

Unique Features:
We currently support 3 external firearms controllers, with more on the way.
We support a unique movement approach called VRMove Me which uses 2 vive trackers to allow users to run in place

Our Movement system fully supports Track Straps, by Rebuff Reality

Our philosophy is that the best training is fun, and that muscle memory developed in virtual reality effectively translates in to real weapon muscle memory.

Current Course Support
5 unique run and gun courses currently available, with more on the way
CQB popup course
150 yard popup rifle range

Current controller support for PISTOL (Glock style grip angle and sight picture):
Vive Controller
Sony Sharpshooter
Cabela's Top Shot Elite (PS3)

Current Controller support for AR-15:
Vive Controller (3d printed stock strongly suggested)
Sony Sharpshooter
Cabela's Top Shot Elite (PS3)
Tactical AR AR-15 fire control group (patent pending)

Current Movement Support:
Controller based directional movement (Menu button, and direction controller is facing, when at a low ready, and pointing your muzzle at the ground)
VRMove ME for all controllers for realistic physical movement based motion

!!! Live in the Beta release !!!

VR Course builder, almost 20 courses included, plus course builder support to add your own. Bind a controller to VRBuilder role, and follow the on screen instructions to start making your own. A future release will include built in course sharing features.
data.short_description: Tactical AR was created with one purpose, to build real firearms skills and habits in virtual reality. Our philosophy is that the best training is fun, and that muscle memory developed in virtual reality effectively translates in to real weapon muscle memory.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Multiple External Gun Controllers Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1070 or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Multiple External Gun Controllers Supported

package_groups.name: subscriptions
package_groups.title: Buy Tactical AR Subscription Plan
package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.

subs.option_description: 27,99€ at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at 27,99€.
